alert.note: Alert for Kimble (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:52PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kimble County through 745 PM CDT... At 652 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Segovia, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Segovia, The Intersection Of I-10 And Us 290 and I-10 Near The Kimble-Kerr County Line. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 458 and 477. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
